alert.note: Alert for Adams; Brown; Clinton; Highland; Pike; Ross (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 7:43AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTH CENTRAL BROWN, NORTHEASTERN ADAMS, SOUTH CENTRAL CLINTON, NORTHWESTERN PIKE, HIGHLAND AND SOUTHWESTERN ROSS COUNTIES THROUGH 815 AM EDT... At 742 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Lynchburg, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Hillsboro, Lynchburg, Marshall, Bainbridge, Kincaid Springs, Belfast, Rocky Fork Point, Highland Holiday, Cynthiana, Russell, New Market, Martinsville, Sinking Spring, St. Martin, Danville in Highland County, Samantha, May Hill, Locust Grove, Berrysville and State Route 136 at US Route 62. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Brown; Clinton; Highland; Pike; Ross
